Package app.repository

Interface FoodRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Food,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Food,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Food,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Food>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Food,Integer>
@Repository public interface FoodRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Food,Integer>

  • Method Details

    • findByName

      Optional<Food> findByName(String name)
      Find food by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the searched food
      Returns:
      the existing food wrapped in an Optional or an empty Optional if no food with the given name exists

    • findByNameAndRestaurant

      @Query("SELECT food from Food food left join food.restaurant restaurant where food.name = ?1 and restaurant.name = ?2") Optional<Food> findByNameAndRestaurant(String food, String restaurant)
      Find food by its name and its restaurant.
      Parameters:
      food - the name of the searched food
      restaurant - the name of the restaurant which contains the given food
      Returns:
      the existing food wrapped in an Optional or an empty Optional if no food with the given name and belonging to the given restaurant exists

    • findAllByRestaurant

      @Query("SELECT food from Food food left join food.restaurant restaurant where restaurant.name = ?1") List<Food> findAllByRestaurant(String restaurant)
      Find all foods of a given restaurant.
      Parameters:
      restaurant - the name of the restaurant whose foods are searched
      Returns:
      a list of all foods belonging to the given restaurant

    • findByRestaurantAndCategory

      @Query("SELECT food from Food food left join food.category category left join food.restaurant restaurant where restaurant.name = ?1 and category.name = ?2") List<Food> findByRestaurantAndCategory(String restaurant, String category)
      Find all foods of a given restaurant and of a given category.
      Parameters:
      restaurant - the name of the restaurant whose foods are searched
      category - the name of the category to which the foods should belong
      Returns:
      a list of all foods belonging to the given restaurant and the given category
